definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: :Is 34:9 pitch (cf. on format. Ol:§ 164 c) Sta:§ 187 a. Word is Armenian acc. to Lag:Arm. Stud. 1351, BN 219; on Egypt. deriv. cf. Cook:Speaker's Comm. i. 484; Ar. zftun acc. to Frä:151, if Shemit., is Aram. loan-wd.; v. also Eth. zft: Di:1068)—pitch:—[[וַתַּחְמְרָה בַחֵמָר וּבַזׇּ֑פֶת]] Ex 2:3 of ark of bulrushes; Is 34:9 a [[וְנֶחֶפְכוּ נְחָלֶיהָ לְזֶפֶת וַעֲפָרָהּ לְגׇפְרִָית]], v:Is 34:9 b :[[והיתה אַרְחָהּ לְזֶפֶת בּׂעֵרָֽה]].
